ISSUE.TITLE: Commits and builds from deleted branches staying around forever
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: (Probably a low priority item) It looks like the `Commits` and `Builds` for deleted feature branches hangs around indefinitely in the database and the UI. I think this can be resolved by either one of : - Detect deleted branches and delete the related `Commits` and `Builds` - Allow branches to be deleted via user action from the Drone UI, which would do the above^.
